title: Superhero Colours
body: Do you know what colour these well-known superheroes are? Drag the items below into the correct slots

_feedback.correct: Well done, you have answered everything correctly!

_incorrect.notFinal: This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly but have more attempts.
_incorrect.final: This feedback will appear if you answered the question incorrectly.

_partlyCorrect.notFinal: This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.
_partlyCorrect.final: This feedback will appear if you answered part of the question correctly.
